snippet: In this post, English Language Learners read about top travel destination, use context clues to identify the meaning of words and phrases, and write about where they would like to travel.
abstract: In this post, English Language Learners read about top travel destination, use context clues to identify the meaning of words and phrases, and write about where they would like to travel.

headline.main: E.L.L. Practice + Prompt | Favorite Travel Destinations
